name: 11.11 "Love Me, Love My Car" Online Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 11 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What animal did Woody have in Sam's office?
questions.explanation:
Pig.

	He told Sam he had some ham, so Sam thought it was actual ham like in the stores. He was not expecting to see a little pig come running out of the office.

questions.text: Where did Rebecca say ham came from?
questions.correct: Big funny shaped cans in aisle six
options: It fell from the sky magically
questions.explanation:
Big funny shaped cans in aisle six.

	She was upset that Woody would even think of hurting such a cute little pig. Rebecca didn't want to accept that the meat people ate came from animals.

He passed away.

	Kirby was the man who bought Sam's corvette. He died from a heart attack. Sam was happy it wasn't a car crash.

Susan.

	Susan was played by Dana Delaney. She was born on March 13, 1956.

questions.text: What did Rebecca name the animal that was in the bar?
questions.explanation:
Snuffles.

	Rebecca had become very attached to this pig. She asked Woody if he would sell him, but Woody said "no".

questions.text: What color red did Sam say his car was?
questions.explanation:
flame red.

	Not wanting to let Kirby's widow know he was interested in the car he said it was blue at first. When she said it was red he said, "flame red, actually".

questions.text: How much was Sam going to pay for the car when he first offered to buy it?
questions.explanation:
Ten grand over two years.

	Sam said he couldn't afford the full market value. Earlier in the episode, he told the guys he'd low ball her.

questions.text: Who told Kirby's widow that Sam had been talking about the car since she first came to the bar?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Susan was hurt and upset that Sam pretended to be her friend. She just gave him the car free of charge.

questions.text: Why did Sam keep dinging his car?
questions.correct: He felt guilty about how he got it.
options: He just hit some bad weather.
questions.explanation:
He felt guilty about how he got it.

	Frasier told him that he was purposely trying to destroy the car. Sam then hit Frasier because he was upset about what Frasier said.

questions.text: In the end, how much did Sam say he'd pay for the car?
questions.explanation:
The full market value.

	He then asked for her forgiveness. She said no, so Sam stayed in her classroom refusing to leave until she forgave him.
